main event: A bright, round white object was spotted in the sky over Highland Park, California on August 3, 1952.
interesting points: The object broke into 6-8 pieces and descended to the ground rapidly.
The observer, a member of the Los Angeles Police Department, plotted the object's trajectory.
The observer had previously seen a similar object in the same area on January 22, 1952.
The object was observed for approximately 1.5 hours.
A second object, described as a 'little light' flying slowly and straight, was observed on August 17 at around 8:20 PM by the observer and their wife.
sighted object: a bright, round white object that broke into pieces and descended rapidly
witnesses: member of the Los Angeles Police Department
